sentences.en: I collect shells and interesting seaside items.
sentences.cn: 我收集贝壳和海边有趣的小玩意儿。

sentences.en: I recollect the days passed by the seaside.
sentences.cn: 我回想起了当初在海边度过的日子。

sentences.en: I went to spend a few days at the seaside.
Ischia is a popular seaside holiday resort.
sentences.cn: 伊斯基亚是个很受欢迎的海滨度假胜地。

sentences.en: Last Sunday the whole family went to the seaside and made a day of it.
sentences.cn: 上周日全家去海边,在那儿痛快地玩了一天.

sentences.en: Let's go to the seaside at the weekend!
sentences.cn: 让我们到海滨去度周末吧!

sentences.en: Our class will make an excursion to the seaside.
Seaside resorts such as Blackpool and Brighton are preparing for a tourist invasion.
sentences.cn: 像布莱克浦与布赖顿这样的海滨胜地正为游客的大批涌入做准备。

sentences.en: The seaside fish market is a ready food supply for scavenging seabirds.
sentences.cn: 海边鱼市是觅食海鸟现成的食物供应地.

sentences.en: The sunrise at the seaside was quite a sight to behold.
The weather at the seaside was ideal — bright and breezy.
sentences.cn: 海边的天气最宜人,风和日丽的.

sentences.en: We had a glorious time at the seaside.
sentences.cn: 我们在海边度过了愉快的时光.

sentences.en: We rented a cottage at the seaside for Christmas.
sentences.cn: 我们在海边租了一栋小别墅度圣诞节.

trans.tran_en: relating to places that are near the sea
the areas or towns near the sea, where people go to enjoy them-selves
